website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for both short-term and long-term probiotic treatments for felines with digestive issues, this is the one to consider.
pros: Prescription-strength ingredients at lower retail price
Very effective with older cats with IBD or renal failure
cons: Some pets may be sensitive to ingredients
Product freshness is a common concern

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised - DANGER!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product on Amazon. Turns out this was made and shipped from China with an American company front. This has made my two dogs very sick. You must do your homework and buy from Nutramax direct. I only gave it one star because you have to to be able to submit review. Warn every pet owner you know. This should be illegal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not Proviable from Nutramax
customer_reviews.text: I saw a review that any Proviable product purchased on Amazon is not really made by Nutramax, even if it uses their packaging. I called Nutramax today (7/19/19) and learned that that is still true. Product that is sold on Amazon is not made by Nutramax. They do not sell on Amazon and the product cannot be sold by vets on Amazon. Only chewy.com or your vet are resources to purchase. While I haven't had a problem with my dog that I can detect from past purchases of 'Proviable' on Amazon, I don't know that the product has helped either. I'd rather buy my product direct from the manufacturer, that is truly Proviable.
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: Something changed.....
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my dog for about a year. Worked great. Then as other people have commented - the capsules on one of the last orders I received were very brittle. I don't know what else changed but I ended up spending almost $1000 at our vet for numerous tests and blood work because our dog was extremely ill. Turns out after stopping this product our dog made a complete recovery. Not sure if it was something with this or if there was an intolerance to an ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: gan

customer_reviews.title: Caused severe diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving my pup Proviable probiotics from our vet with great results. After giving him these as directed he had severe diarrhea. As soon as I stopped giving them he got better. I don't know if I got a bad batch, but I would recommend caution.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Dog got extremely sick then eventually died. Counterfeit. BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Counterfeit. BEWARE Five minutes after giving my dog this......Violent and extreme vomiting and diarrhea and extreme pain to where she could not sit or lay down. Took her to the vet. They said she was dying. They put her on fluids and antibiotics. Aspiration in lung when lung where clear just a week before with her xray Also, we don't know if this contributed to her severe IBS . She died months later from never being able to recover Also a victim of the Hill's diet dog food vitamin D toxicity. Nutramax only wants you to purchase from your veterinarian. PLease, don't buy ANY supplements from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: margaretjeanpage

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to be as good as what I buy from my vet... made my dog flatulent
customer_reviews.text: The 30ct. I purchased at my veterinarian worked great. The 80 pack I purchased from Amazon made my dog flatulent. Maybe I received a bad batch, maybe not. I looked into returning it but you only have 30 days, I was still using my veterinarian supply before the 30 days were up.
customer_reviews.author: gofortheiMan

customer_reviews.title: Great for IBD/ food allergies
customer_reviews.text: My cat has very bad food allergies and IBD, so he is currently on a hydrolyzed diet but also needs probiotics. He gets Fortiflora in the mornings when his appetite is waning because it keeps him interested and it's really important that he keeps his weight up, but we also use Proviable in the evenings to make sure he is getting a good probiotic formula. With this combo he hasn't had the blowout diarrhea or projectile vomiting in probably a year now.
customer_reviews.author: trinklest

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do anything. I first got this brand from my vet, for my cats that have IBS, then found them here much cheaper. Never saw any improvement after being on them for months for both my cats. Both my cats have IBS- one from Friskies pate canned food. If you need probiotics, use Vitality Science brand instead. I saw immediate improvement with the day with both my cats on the Feline Comfort Plus. This was the first product or treatment besides the med prednisone where I got any positive results for my kitties. Plus you can mix it into their food and not have to pill them- and it makes it more appetizing for them with the tuna flavor.
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These work wonders!! After a bad experience with another probiotic product, my vet recommended these, which work amazingly well. My vet gave me proviable forte when the last product gave my dog violent diarrhea, but I switched to these and give one in the morning and one in the afternoon. My pup hasn’t had a loose stool since (roughly 45 days). The difference in the forte vs dc is simply dosage. Roughly 2 dc = 1 forte. For reference I have a 105 lb Rhodesian Ridgeback.
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Efficacy is unknown
customer_reviews.text: Probiotics are good for balancing gut flora. However, based on my understanding about probiotics, the better brands require refrigeration to keep the active cultures viable. With that said, I've these for several months with my cats who are battling various geriatric diseases. They're eating biologically species appropriate raw diets which has its own nutritional benefits. Therefore it's difficult to determine if this brand probiotic is making any difference. One thing is for certain, no two living species are alike thus everyone will respond differently to supplements that's consumed. This isn't a definitive review but it's my honest anecdotal opinion I can only share for anyone considering probiotics for their beloved pets.
customer_reviews.author: Weekly Whiskers

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and in the past purchased from the vet. This is my first time writing review for this product. I question this product as the box came open, and the capsules are half the size of the ones I buy locally. I ordered on line as the locals where out, I wont' be ordering again, maybe the the 30 count is larger, more per capsule which I expected and didn't get with the 80 ct.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Bought several times- last time wasn't good
customer_reviews.text: We give this to our cat who has varying medical conditions, including irritable bowel disease. We have had several boxes and never had a complaint. But the last box we bought was not their typical product. When we broke the capsule open, it was clumpy and an off color. Later we found out there was a recall on this product after we had given it to our cat. Thankfully, he didn't suffer any adverse effects. But we have since stopped buying this products.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaving Probiotic for Dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog was originally put on these probiotics by our vet. My poodle has had horrible GI issues for years and we've never found anything that will help her until now. Within a few days of starting these probiotics, her tummy issues having dramatically improved. She is suddenly full of energy and seems so much more content. Her GI issues have almost completely resolved with just a couple weeks use of this probiotic. I also saved a great deal of money by purchasing these from Amazon instead of continuing to purchase from my vet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Casings shatter
customer_reviews.text: As far as the product, I can't tell one way or another, if it is helping our animals. My main problem is the casing shattering, as you try to pull it apart, to sprinkle on the food. It's happened, five different times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat Healed Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Our rescue cat, Max was having painful intestinal issues which included bloody diarrhea and after researching the problem, the recommendation was probiotics for 30 days. Proviable DC for Cats and Dogs turned out to have the best mix of both pro- and prebiotics and after four days, Max improved and seems to be back to normal. One of the other cats (we have a total of five rescues) was watching me, and I decided to sprinkle one capsule in a bowl. She ate it plain. The cats are on a grain-free diet which contains probiotics, and apparently it's not enough, We decided to sprinkle the capsules on their food to ensure a better digestive health.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic was recommended to me by a naturopathic vet. Have been giving it to all my dogs for about a month and there is a noticeable improvement in their stools. I think it is also helping my one elderly dog with chronic pancreatitis as she has not thrown up or had diarrhea during this time.
customer_reviews.author: frogprince

customer_reviews.title: Does it work? I guess
customer_reviews.text: My vet prescribed this for my dog who suffers from gastrointestinal disease and pancreatitis. Does it work? I guess. My dog's stools are a healthy color again and solid. It's a small sized tubular pill that easily can be hidden in food. My dog has never spit it out and he doesn't usually eat pills. I'm not 100% sure this is the cause of my dogs healthier stools bc he is also on other medication, but I have faith in my vet any dog is doing very well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic for cats
customer_reviews.text: None of our cats who take it have an issue with it, and they are super sensitive to tastes and smells. I just sprinkle a capsule over their food and they eat it without any problems. We tried at least 2 other brands before but this is by far the best. 2 different vets recommended it. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Chippy

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have helped my cat with IBS
customer_reviews.text: This is half the strength of the same product you might get directly from your vet, but it's the same product that is extremely fast and easy to open and sprinkle on the food. I give my cat one entire capsule per bowl, and she eats usually 3 bowls per day. It seems to have really helped reduce the messy symptoms of IBS that she diagnosed with fairly recently.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Fribush

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated ingredients
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my vet and might be a great product, but it actually made my pup diarrhea worse.
customer_reviews.author: Turboshibas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, most balanced and therapeutic probiotic
customer_reviews.text: This brand of probiotic was recommended by 3 vets for our dog, after treating her for a recalcitrant UTI with antibiotics for a month. It's very effective, and the result has been no recurrence of UTI and a huge improvement in her gastrointestinal health. She also has had a great number of food intolerances since she was born, which seem to be gradually resolving after administering this to her every 3rd day for the past 4 months. I will continue to give this to her indefinitely - she takes it readily in a pill pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Missing Capsules
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have been on Proviable for many years and I have always been satisfied. In my last order of Proviable from Amazon three sheets that were suppose to have capsules had empty capsules. There was nothing in them. I feel I was totally cheated out of most of the capsules I was to receive. The box they came in was sealed, so must have been done when packing. Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Carole B.

customer_reviews.title: This seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I tried another name brand first...it did not work....my vet supplied an initial supply so I ordered the packaging and it seems to work for my 13 year old cat who almost died from "fatty liver'" disease last year.....after nursing her back to helath with meds and force feeding her four times a day for 12 weeks....her loose bowel issues have improved with use of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Really Helped the Dog...and My Cats!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. I give to my dog and my cats. My dog—a lab mix—has a sensitive stomach, on Rx food and prone to pancreatitis—has really been helped by this. I tried it because I thought “no more $300 vet bills” there must be a way to support her. This has really made a difference. When I gave to the cats, I noticed their litter box was much less stinky. (It must have helped something! I don’t know but it was a huge change.) Just nice to know it helped them. I’m so impressed I may start taking myself. Lol
customer_reviews.author: wordsandmusic365

customer_reviews.title: Second box seems to be no good, dog sick.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this 80 pack once before and it was fine. This second pack our dog started getting sick. Trying to rule out different things. After reading a few of the latest reviews of others having issues, not taking any chances and stopping it right away. I’ll go back to getting it from the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: Revitalized an Elderly Dog
customer_reviews.text: This completely changed my dog's disposition. He became lethargic and wouldn't eat for 5 days. We had taken him to the vet and they said he had an upset stomach and gave him anti-nausea pills that only worked for a little bit. Within 2 days after using this he started eating again and got his pep back. He's 14 years old so we know his age has a lot to do with it but this brought him back to his previous disposition. We've been using this for 2 weeks with no problems. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DMay95

customer_reviews.title: Vet suggested
customer_reviews.text: My vet suggested I try this. Probiotic for the pups tummies. I don't consume this so I have no idea what the flavor is like. It comes in a capsule, IF you can get a dog to eat a capsule go for it. I open the capsule and sprinkle the powder inside on my dogs' food. Has no smell.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: A real breakthrough for our dog - a price less than half the vet price
customer_reviews.text: Much less expensive than buying at the vet. A real breakthrough for our dog - we were giving her 2 Prilosec per day for digestive issues. Vet agreed we should try these instead. Purchased first box at vet for more than twice the Amazon price. Worked wonders for the dog - no more Prilosec and her digestive problems are solved! No more risk of excess Prilosec. Vet says the real benefits of pro-biotics are becoming more evident every day. You can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Connecticut Fan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very brittle. Broken each one as I gently pushed out of packet. Returning. Something not right with these.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitties after a round of antibiotics
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for my kitten who had IBS. And this helped him alot, while he is having a flare, I give it with each meal, then maybe just once a week, or anytime I have had to give either cat antibiotics. Normal less stinky stools returned. Just FYI, I order it in the winter because NO COOL PACK is included in the shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Muffie

customer_reviews.title: Helped my cat heal from symptoms of irritable bowel disease
customer_reviews.text: My cat has been on prednisone for two years for IBD, but she was still irregular until I put her on two of these capsules once a day. (She's 22 pounds; for a smaller cat, one capsule is enough and it's possible to overdue.) Now she's healthy as can be! This probiotic contains several strains of good bacteria; FortiFlora contains only one. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my dog's chronic diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old lab mix began experiencing chronic diarrhea. The vet thought it was due to stress (I've had to travel for work a lot lately), gave us some anti-diarrheals and sent us on our way. After a good month of this and a poor appetite, I was starting to get a bit desperate. A friend recommended this probiotic. Her dog had had a similar issue. I decided to give it a try. It worked like a charm. Within 3 days, her stools were firm again. It's now been about 3 months and we've had no more problems with diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Krussel

customer_reviews.title: My German Shepherd Dog has been taking this since he ...
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd Dog has been taking this since he was diagnosed with Exocrine Pancreatic Insufficiency (EPI). The probiotics help reduce the risk of imbalance in his small bowel due to a lack of pancreatic enzymes which aid in digestion and absorption. The item is as described and is reasonably priced. I buy the 80 pack; if there was a larger quantity available, I'd buy that!
customer_reviews.author: QuilterRN

customer_reviews.title: Probiotic has helped IBD kitty
customer_reviews.text: We have a cat with IBD for 4 yrs. Have tried 3 other probiotics. He wouldn't take, eat in food, or throw up. These we use powder and water and syringe into mouth. He has taken and we have seen improvement in his appetite and perkiness. Added ground pork to diet 6 wks later. He needed more protein and cannot eat higher quality canned, chicken, or hamburger. He is able to eat and enjoys the ground pork.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal, smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver! Great product
customer_reviews.text: These probiotics are fantastic!! Both of my dogs had GI upset after we moved, and I took them to the vet to make sure they didn't pick up any parasites or something at the new house. The vet recommended these instead of antibiotics, which I was already pleased with, but their stools we're back to normal in just a couple days! I continue to give these daily for overall GI health, they are definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bannon

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well For Our Cat
customer_reviews.text: Our senior cat has always had occasional vomiting, usually hair or when she ate too fast. However, she became sick with diarrhea, and the vet prescribed this to help her gastrointestinal system recover. It worked so well, we kept her on it, and the regular vomiting stopped, as well. She's even more active and social than before. We sprinkle a whole capsule on a tablespoon of canned food and mix it with a few drops of water to make a gruel, and she loves it! She gets it once daily. Easy peasy!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Major improvement for our cat.
customer_reviews.text: Our vet recommended this product for our cat with pancreatitis. He has acid reflux and problems with nausea, and the famotidine he's on wasn't helping as much as we wanted. We haven't been able to take him off his medication, but his digestive problems have greatly decreased with the Proviable. We sprinkle the capsules on his food. He was a little reluctant to eat at first, but that reluctance wore off quickly. Grateful for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P. Strehl

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: Saved my dog. He had such serious diarrhea (just water, really) that the vet was concerned. He lost more than 15 pounds. I tried everything, prescription food, other probiotics, antibiotics. Nothing worked. I was about to give up. He was helped greatly by getting no-grain food but still was in bad shape. I added Proviable DC to his grain-free food and within a week, the diarrhea was gone. This after close to a year of different treatments. I'll never be without Proviable again.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Paulson

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie was having digestive issues when I first got her. Working with my Vet she suggested a probiotic and said these were the only ones that worked. Ever since then I have been giving them daily to my dog in her Fresh Pet food and she is a healthy happy girl!! No more digestive issues since I changed her food from kibble yo Fresh Pet. I now order on Amazon. Thank you for carrying a wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.author: Yorkiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Cats got Severe Diarrhea from Most Recent Purchase -- didn't happen from prior boxes
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product in the past for my cats and I was very happy with it. However, when I gave my cats the probiotic from the most recent box that I purchased, both cats got a bad case of diarrhea. Unfortunately, I purchased the large box so now I need to toss out almost 80 capsules. The expiration date says 07/19 and I have stored it in the refrigerator. I am so disappointed that this is no longer a reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Le Chat

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is magic!!
customer_reviews.text: Adopted ac14 year old blind poodle.. she’d been stray... eating garbage, I figure. Her digestive system was a mess. This stuff is magic! In a few months she was totally renewed!
customer_reviews.author: Altoprincess

customer_reviews.title: Not for every cat, mine died from this
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my cat, he ended up defacating the lining of his intestines out and dying. I showed the vet the pictures of the clear mucosa my cat was expelling and all he could say is "oh, that's bad" then sent me home with nothing and the cat ended up dying.
customer_reviews.author: haha

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has bad allergies. She was constantly getting Staph infections which eventually led to MRSA. This probiotic has been the saving grace for my dog. Even when she starts getting a small skin infection, this stuff really helps knock it out quickly. It has skso eliminated her continual yeast infections. So happy to have found this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: I rarely do product reviews but this product is remarkable. My 17 week old rottie was having frequent diarrhea and soft serve ice cream like stool for the last 4 weeks. We slowly changed her diet over that time period with no improvement. We had been giving her high quality breed and age specific dog food to no avail. Within 24 hours of starting this product her stools became firm and the diarrhea ceased. This is now day 5 with solid stools since starting Proviable. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer for food allergy dog
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for over a year since vet recommended it for a pup with a sensitive GI system, likely food allergies. Most good pet foods add probiotics to their diet but this dog eats special prescription food that lacks them so we are repeat buyers. Since this is not in a treat form or flavored tablet it doesn’t set off a allergy reaction and it’s really easy to open and sprinkle powder on dogs meal or you could give it like medicine.
customer_reviews.author: Barking HawkTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed box inside a perfect box ?!!!?
customer_reviews.text: The actual caplsules were intact but the box was destroyed- and not in shipping. The shipping box was perfect and this capsules were the only thing inside - a destroyed manufacturers box with the pills dumped out, wrapped in bubble wrap, inside a perfect cardboard shipping box. Figure that one out. It honestly makes me worry these are knockoffs or something and i am hesistant to give them to my dog
customer_reviews.author: MrAurora

customer_reviews.title: Best ones out there
customer_reviews.text: Since there can be big differences in the quality of these supplements I bought this brand on the recommendation of a vet. My GSD was experiencing a bout of runny stools after a couple courses of antibiotics and these worked wonderfully! The capsules can also be opened up and sprinkled on the dog's food but I was worried that mine wouldn't eat the food. He doesn't accept pills very well so it took a bit of creativity to get him to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: UPSwidow

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my Persian Cat Breeder
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my Persian Cat Breeder when I adopted a kitten for good health, and especially if and when the kitten develops diarrhea or constipation. However, any probiotic should be administered daily, not just when the cat develops a problem. It's difficult to tell if and when any Probiotic, not just this brand, works or not.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystel

customer_reviews.title: Really helped our dog
customer_reviews.text: This was prescribed by a Vet for our dog who had a constant "gurgling tummy" with bouts of diarrhea and not eating. After about a week of taking this daily, her symptoms cleared up and she was back to normal. I found this product on Amazon for half the cost of what the Vet charged, and she has been on it for almost a year now and her stomach issues have never returned.
customer_reviews.author: Tony N

customer_reviews.title: has helped 2 of my dogs
customer_reviews.text: Two of my dogs have had GI issues so I put them on Proviable. They have been on it for an extended period of time and it has helped both of them. I have it auto-shipped so I won't forget to order it. I have no intentions of taking them off. I highly recommend at least giving it a try if your dog is having issues. The pill is small enough that it just mixes in with their food, I don't need to give it to them separately.
customer_reviews.author: hmdoylestown

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic without costing a fortune.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product to help support my dog's GI system for a while and have not had any issues with either the product or the results. There is another fantastic product on the market (Visbiome), but it costs FOUR TIMES more than this one and unfortunately I cannot afford it. This product works fine and is reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Yankee

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This is really helped my Frenchie who was pretty stinky and also has problems as pirating and with his esophagus, so we need to keep his tummy calm. He's been on this for a few months and so far no problems and less stinky. He takes this in conjunction with Prilosec to help him if he has any kind of belly issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product really helped my sweet 16 year old boy with his gut. He's a kitty. It has improved his overall health and he behaves like he just feels better. The probiotics balances his gut so he has normal bowel function. I mix it in with his wet food every morning and it's undetectable to him. It also costs a lot less to get it here than from the vet.
customer_reviews.author: constant reader

customer_reviews.title: Fixes my cat's IBD
customer_reviews.text: Our complicat, Lucky, has IBD. Two caps of Proviable a day, sprinkled over wet food, and his IBD is not a problem anymore. We think it doesn't taste of anything because of the way he gobbles down his food regardless of the Proviable. This stuff has changed my lil guy's life.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved by a sphynx and two devon rex kitties
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats (a sphynx and two devon rexs) None of my cats object to the powder when I open the capsules... My sphynx will let me sprinkle the powder right onto her food as she's eating, one devon will lick the powder out of my hand (and he is the MOST picky eater I have) and my other devon likes to chew up the whole capsule and then lick the powder, now... I realize this makes her a bit odd, so I wouldn't use her as a rule but the other two who are both typical finicky eaters have no problem with the powder inside so for the unanimous vote from my kids I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Vegan

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good probiotic
customer_reviews.text: Our Border Collie has a very sensitive stomach. She also had the worst breath ever. So after try many different ones, we used this after a bout of diarrhea with no cause. We have used it for a month and her breath is great and she seems like she is quite happy!
customer_reviews.author: Marion T. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: My veterinarian told us to give this to our Yorkie because she suffers from colitis. When she is sick she goes down hill very quickly. Her doctor explained how the probiotics work VERY quickly. It was a much better price on Amazon. I give it to my dog very other night. She feels so much better taking this.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkie Mama

customer_reviews.title: 59 for 80 capsules represents a super savings! The vet told us we could either ...
customer_reviews.text: Our veterinarian prescribed this for our dog following a severe stomach upset. They come on cards of ten capsules each, and he charged us $25 for two cards -- twenty capsules, two a day for ten days. The dog did so well on them that we agreed with the vet that she should continue to take one a day. The price of $32.59 for 80 capsules represents a super savings! The vet told us we could either administer the capsules themselves, or twist it open and sprinkle the powder over her food. Slightly dampening ones fingers makes twisting the capsules easier.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive stomachs
customer_reviews.text: My pup has IBD and the vet was afraid we may have to put him on a strict and expensive regimen but adding this in with his morning meal has made all the difference. I am so thrilled that my dog is happy and healthy and it that I didn’t have to take out a second mortgage to accomplish that!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Lomax

customer_reviews.title: Great benefit to my fur-baby
customer_reviews.text: Frequently, my now 11 year black lab would have very soft/runny stools; however, since giving this to her once a day it has made a huge difference. So much so, I can tell, when my husband has to feed the dogs, that my lab didn't get her pill. This has been a great benefit to my sweet fur-baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy that the capsules are available separately from the kit
customer_reviews.text: A vet sold us the kit with the capsules and the paste. It worked well, but was very expensive from the vets. I was so happy to find first the kit and then even better yet the capsules by themselves through Amazon at a lower cost. I use them a lot for my kitties - both for general health and when they happen to get a bought of diarrhea (after catching and eating something they shouldn't!).
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Cat is much happier now
customer_reviews.text: My cat was experiencing diarrhea and vet recommended adding a probiotic. The reviews were good for this product so I bought it. I add it to his food every day and he's a much happier cat.
customer_reviews.author: Gale E. Ennis

customer_reviews.title: defective med
customer_reviews.text: have used this med for a few years. Bought several boxes recently and find all the powder in the caps has jelled! This tells me the caps are no good as the bacillus will have been killed. Such a waste! will not order again not going to take a chance. Have no idea how many previous boxes had the same problem as I don't usually take the caps apart, just today thought I would sprinkle it on their food. Not a happy camper sigh lew.
customer_reviews.author: LEW

customer_reviews.title: Huge help for dogs with stomach issues
customer_reviews.text: Great for dogs with stomach issues. Easier for our bigger dog since we can hide it in a treat. But the smaller ones can't do that because they are tiny dogs. With it being a capsule can't break it up, and opening to put in their food they won't eat it then. Would be great if it were a tablet for smaller dogs so it could be broken up.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Giving him these has made him act like a kitten again
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats has digestive issues because a couch was dropped on him as a kitten. Giving him these has made him act like a kitten again. He's 7 years old but runs around the house like hes 1. Amazing to see the difference. It took a few weeks to notice, but I'll give this to him forever. I split 1 pill between 2 cats every night. We empty the capsule into a small amount of water, mix it up, and then pour it over both of their dinners. I love how much this has helped my kitty. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: HippieChick

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for a decade!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr. old Lhasa Apso had constant problems with her bowels, I.e. Infections. Our Vet suggested probiotics to deal with the problem. Ten years later and she has not any problems, whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: AMF

customer_reviews.title: Just the doctor's order
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy eats an occasional bagel or what not at the park and other carelessly left foods. This leads to diarrhea for a day or two. The vet suggested this along with sweet potato and since then we have her consume both daily. The pill once a day unless a bagel incident and we give it to her twice day.
customer_reviews.author: GingerB

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Literally the same my Vet has been charging 3 times as much for. The expiration on these was even longer than the ones I paid an absorbent amount of money for. This says, "Only for Prescription Use". Well, my dogs have been prescribed this, and it's just a good Source of Probiotic for their digestive system all together. Hopefully I will be able to buy this here for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: V.Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Improved our dogs protein loss disorder issues
customer_reviews.text: This is part of our dogs routine to help with her protein loss disorder. It definitely works to help keep her from having diarrhea and has helped in her overall improvement as part of her vitamin routine. She takes one everyday. I open it and pour it over her food. She’s 15 and going strong.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Finally itch relief for our girl!
customer_reviews.text: After 18 days of giving to our dog the improvement is drastic. She is no longer scratching incessantly her skin is about 98% better and her hair is growing back very quickly. We have been trying to figure out for months what to do to give her relief and I think we finally have our answer. We and our Dixie girl thank you.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: A Must for your pets
customer_reviews.text: excellent product...didn't realize how important probiotics were for my dog & cats..and since I have been using this product for over 1 month I see a big difference in how they act..they don't throw up like they used to..(cats) dog - there was a big difference in her coat . She is a black lab and always had "dandruff" . A animal nutritionist started her on this product and she has been doing great since
customer_reviews.author: Simply Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended as a good product to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is the probiotic my Vet recommended. It is easy to add to my cat’s wet food. She doesn’t seem to realize that I’ve added anything ! My only dislike is that this ships all the way from California! Why can’t Amazon stock this item.... they sell a lot of it because there are times it is out of stock and I have to find it elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Adamec

customer_reviews.title: the difference in my dogs digestion is remarkable
customer_reviews.text: I was changing food & treats plus having vet bills until I started my dog on Proviable. It has nearly eliminated his stomach issues in 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly dog
customer_reviews.text: These are for my dog and he will eat them when i stock the pill in his food. He has no trouble eating them. They have helped me process his food better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product, will get again from time to time.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this product. Pooches don't mind swallowiing with a greenie pill pocket. 2/3 cheaper than getting from my vet. I will alternate the capsules with a daily spoonful of greek, unsweetened yogurt or a spoonful of sweet potato. The probiotics are especially helpful when your pet has undergone an antibiotic regimen and the stomach flora has been reduced by antibiotic. Then you can do the yogurt or potato thing--cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Good Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: My dogs don’t taste this I just sprinkle on food they never know it’s there and makes them have great digestion. Bought this originally from my vet but find it less $$ on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: First one of several that fussy, suspicious cat will actually eat!
customer_reviews.text: First this works. Second, it needed to be ingested in order to work. This was the Third probiotic I've tried for fussy kitty who needed help with tummy issues during long term antibiotic use. None of the others met the taste test, as he has a super sensitive nose, and immediately backed away no matter how deeply the powders etc., were buried. This is the one that has NO added flavoring, which for us is an excellent thing! Thank you Proviable for realizing that some cats don't like strong smells and flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: My dogs now have balance.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that has helped balance our dogs bowels! One a day makes the diarrhea away! So easy to add to their food too. They don’t even know they are eating it. Reasonable price too!
customer_reviews.author: Jazminda

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our cat
customer_reviews.text: Seems to help our cat greatly, who suffers from a pancreas problem/diabetes. It took a few weeks to calm his stomach down (he was vomiting and having bad diarrhea), and now he's totally fine. We use this in combination with PancrePlus (only by prescription from our vet), with enzymes to break the food down a bit before he eats it. And of course his insulin, which he has by injection. Our vet recommended the Proviable and I'm glad I can get it on Amazon a bit cheaper than at his office.
customer_reviews.author: C. Crain

customer_reviews.title: working well
customer_reviews.text: These were what our vet said to get for our cats. Probiotics are very important for cats bellys. They are assimilating it well. They don't give back their food as much now either. It's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: music mom

customer_reviews.title: Dealt with dog's terrible gas. expensive but effective.
customer_reviews.text: These are expensive...I mean expensive! But they deal with our dog's gas, and he has awful gas. It is so bad that sometimes I want to lock him outside. However, when we include a probiotic with each meal, the gas disappears and it's easy to have him around.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Our little one kept getting sick, about every month. She would throw up and have diarrhea to the point we would have to go get fluids and have them inject meds. The last bout she was so sick she ended up having to stay in the hospital. After the hospital stay, the vet recommended these, and we haven't had another episode of sickness whatsoever!! It's been almost six months; it has been a miracle product for our pup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for pets with sensitive stomachs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for pets with sensitive stomachs. My kitty doesn’t spit up as much now. Also he takes it easily in his food cause it’s white so it blends in well and its tasteless
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Fabry

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Dogs Life
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great product that my veterinarian told me to use for my Rottweiler that has HGE disease. This product has saved my dogs Life. I would Highly Recommend this product for all dogs!!!! It’s a way to keep your dog Healthy.
customer_reviews.author: KATHI DELANEY

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: I love proviable...when I actually receive it! I received a completely empty, perfectly sealed bubble envelope instead! So bummed! Can’t say I’ve ever had this happen before!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pet probiotic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I have been using this probiotics for my two cats and my lab for over a year. They all do well on it, it's easy to use, just empty a capsule and mixing their food. I like that it's just one small capsule. Another product I had been using for my dog required a giant scoop of powder to be mixed into her food, but with her powdered vitamins I thought this was too much powder. Very convenient to use and my fussy persian kitties eat it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Lover

customer_reviews.title: Helps with fragile tummys.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has frequent bouts of stomach problems and this product is what our vet recommended to use daily with his meal. I open the capsule and sprinkle the powder onto his food. It has very little odor if any it is a beefy odor. I have used this product daily for at least 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Seiler

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm. Live Saver.
customer_reviews.text: This item has been saving our lives. It works every time. If I give one capsule as soon as I catch our dog having diarrhea, it normally takes care of it within 24 hours although I have noticed that most dogs seem to take time to be used to this at first. In our case, it took about 4-5 days to see the result in the very beginning then works like a charm after that. In my opinion, this is a much better way than making them suffer or getting a shot at the vet. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Juliam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gastrointestinal support
customer_reviews.text: Our German Shepherd Buster has gastrointestinal damage from suspected long term tapeworm infections prior to us rescuing him. As a result, he has difficulty digesting his food and absorbing nutrients. In combination with a prescription hydrolyzed protein diet, Proviable has helped us stop his weight loss and diarrhea, thank goodness! We've tried other probiotics but Proviable made the biggest difference with stool quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Helps my dog
customer_reviews.text: This helped my dog with a sensitive stomach. I hid them in his food and he never complained. They helped solidify his stool. These are recommended from a veterinarian and I'm glad it was able to find them for a cheaper price than what the vet office sells them for.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Miller

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Pet Healthy You
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats was diagnosed with IBD and the Internist recommended Proviable along with prescription food. He’s been on Proviable for about 6 mths now and I noticed that he doesn’t vomit as much as he used to. A few months ago I switched to a different probiotic to try and noticed it wasn’t working as well so I switched back to Proviable. I would highly recommend Proviable as a probiotic for your FurBabies health!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Helps my concience
customer_reviews.text: Hoping they work good for the old dog..she almost died with what they're calling Acute Hemorrhagic Gastroenteritis . The one's from the vet are too expensive. Her doo-doo looks stellar so I'll keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Love-N-Kindness

customer_reviews.title: Great price and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest per day probiotic that is actually effective. I work in the veterinary field and the probiotics that I like best are proviable, fortiflora, and the human align. When you buy the 80 capsule amount it is cheaper than the other two and work just as well. My dogs hate capsules so I just open it up and sprinkle it on the food and they both eat it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Davison

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak about it's flavor or scent be ause this is for my cat. I haven't sniffed nor tasted it. But it came to us with a useable best by date and the package was in tact, it was exactly as promised. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Littlelorelai

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think this has helped our dogs IBS. She is a 2 year old black lab and we started her on these about a month ago. We switched her to a very high end dog food, Acana, which is a single source protein (lamb), grain free and is absolutely amazing. These two coupled together has cured her IBS and we are so greatful. We did countless hours of research trying to cure her on our own instead of having her on medication her whole life. I may end up trying Probiotic Miracle or Mercole's Probiotic just to see how those do. Overall these seemed to help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: JLAXRB

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: it does help my cat with his diarrhea at first, but after awhile my cat doesn't wanna eat it anymore. I used to just mix it with his canned food but for some reasons he doesn't like it anymore and will walk away if he smelled it.
customer_reviews.author: NT@PASADENA

customer_reviews.title: A vet recommended this to me and after paying an arm and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a special needs dog who was unable to have boiled chicken or anything seeming too high in protein. A vet recommended this to me and after paying an arm and a leg for 30 capsules from the vet, I found this life saver on amazon. WHAT A DEAL. Not only is the price great, but my little buddy is able to now have things she was unable to eat before due to sensitive digestion. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pea

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my Labrador
customer_reviews.text: This cleared up my black Labrador's chronic ear infections and I am really amazed that this worked, and worked so quickly. I noticed a big difference half way through the first box. After years of vet bills all they did was give me antibiotics and ear flush which never really worked, and his ears were still red, full of wax and stunk bad. Now no more ripping at his ears with his paw and he looks so much better that he is no longer pulling one ear down. He doesn't even rub his head on the hallway walls and bed any more.
customer_reviews.author: Greg DeLucia

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended buy the vet nutritionist for our rescue dog that ...
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended buy the vet nutritionist for our rescue dog that had digestive issues. We have been using this for over a year and are now giving it to both our dogs. I think it has been a great additive for our rescue and helped the others ear infections as he has gotten only very mild yeast infections compared to all out nasty he had been getting before. I just open one capsule and sprinkle on their kibble and neither dog seems offended by the taste so it very easy to administer to them. It is a bit of money to keep them healthy but for my furkids it is worth it! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Bridget H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my cat’s stomach issues.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my cat who was having stomach issues and diarrhea problems. After just a few days of use both problems went away. The capsules were easy to use and sprinkle on wet food and the cat did not even notice. I continued the capsules for two weeks and we are both pkeased with results.
customer_reviews.author: S. Martin

product_meta.title: Proviable DC for Cats and Dogs, 80 Capsules
product_meta.description: Proviable is a probiotic digestive health supplement that contains 7 key probiotic strains and 5 billion colony forming units of beneficial bacteria to help support a healthy intestinal balance in dogs and cats
feature_bullets: CONTAINS 7 STRAINS OF BENEFICIAL BACTERIA: A probiotic with multiple strains, each having different properties, has a potentially higher likelihood of colonization versus a single strain product

SUPPORTS GASTROINTESTINAL HEALTH IN DOGS AND CATS: Imbalances such as stress from travel or kenneling, or change in diet can affect your pet’s gastrointestinal health; Signs of an imbalance include loose stool, decreased appetite, or vomiting

CONTAINS PREBIOTICS TO SUPPORT GROWTH: Prebiotics are complex carbohydrates that can be used as a food source for our probiotic strains; This helps to support the growth of the probiotics within the intestinal tract and helps them to compete against the harmful bacteria for colonization of the intestines
EASY TO GIVE: Contents of capsules can be easily sprinkled over food
